text: Yi paigambaraharu hun. Tiniharumadhye hamile kehimathi kehila'i pradhanata pradana gareka chaum. Kehi yasta chan josita allahale kura garyo ra kehika darja ucca banayo ra mariyamako putra isala'i camatkaraharu pradana garyo ra ruhulkudsadvara (pavitra atma) unala'i maddata puryayo. Yadi allahale caheko bha'e, tinibhanda pahileka manisaharu aphnache'u nisaniharu a'isakepachi apasama kadapi yud'dha gardainathe, tara tiniharule matabhedaka kura gare, tiniharumadhye kehi ta astika bha'ihale ra kehi kaphira (nastika) nai rahe. Ra yadi allahale caheko bha'e yi manisaharu apasama ladne thi'enan, tara allahale je cahancha, gardacha
